mapper.select: select cart_id,p.product_code,c.member_id,p.filename,p.size,m.member_name,p.product_name,price,price*amount money,color,amount from member m,cart c,product p where m.member_id=c.member_id and c.product_code = p.product_code and c.member_id = #{userid} order by cart_id
select coalesce(sum(price*amount),0) from cart c,product p where c.product_code=p.product_code and member_id=#{user_id}
mapper.update: update cart set amount=#{amount} where cart_id=#{cart_id}
